text: The Great Dictator is a 1940 American political satire comedy-drama movie written, directed, produced, scored by, and starring British comedian Charlie Chaplin, following the tradition of many of his other movies. ==References== Category:1940 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Charlie Chaplin Category:Movies about dictators Category:Movies about Adolf Hitler Category:Movies about antisemitism Category:Movies set in a fictional country Category:Movies set in Europe Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies set in concentration camps Category:Esperanto-language movies
title: The Great Dictator
